Should be updated with the latest trends in the fashion, lifestyle and luxury business Collaborate with the design team to produce high-quality visual / video content for various channels, including digital, print, and social media. Support the maintenance and evolution of brand guidelines to ensure consistency across all visual elements Qualifications: Degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field from a reputed institute. Strong proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Basic proficiency in video editing software at the beginner level. (Premier Pro, After effect) Solid understanding of design principles, layout, typography, and color theory. Creative mindset with the ability to translate concepts into visually appealing designs. Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team. Strong attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines. Portfolio Requirement: The portfolio should demonstrate a range of campaigns, design projects and highlight creativity, technical skills, and an understanding of design principles. The Role: As a Graphic Designer, you are responsible for creating best-in-class Visual Merchandise Props, Collaterals, Digital Communications, branding, etc. that align with present trends. This includes working on media such as Visual Merchandise, websites, corporate branding, digital communications, etc. As a Graphic designer, you are expected to conduct research, define problem statements, and deliver design solutions. Role Description Collaborate with cross-functional teams across the lifecycle to evolve the concept for a design project, putting together functional designs. Create a best-in-class visual experience with an elaborate planning and execution strategy. Define visual language for consistent and brilliant user focus. Participate in user research and gather insights that inform the experience Requirements Good communication skills Excellent critical thinking & and analytical skills with an ability for problem-finding and analysis Demonstrated ability to apply design thinking Ability to collaborate and influence (with and without formal authority) business stakeholders, designers and development teams. Excellent Knowledge of Adobe Creative Cloud, Coral Draw and relevant design software applications. Focus on collaboration to achieve outcomes. Ability to plan and manage projects with or without guidance and thrive in ambiguity. A design school degree is an added advantage. Preferred Qualification: Bachelors Degree - Vis Comm / Mass Comm / Fine Arts / NIFT Creative Education UG:   Any Graduate Key Skills Skills highlighted with  are preferred key skills Communication Skills Visual Merchandising Corel Draw Digital Branding Creativity Creative Designing Analytical Skills Adobe Creative Suite Report this job About company Honeycomb Creative Support is an integrated marketing communication agency, with nearly 14 years of experience marketing in diverse sectors such as lifestyles, IT, pharmaceuticals, healthcare, education, manufacturing, and automotive. The firm provides creative design and marketing services to local and international clients using creative vision, information analysis, strategic thinking, and execution to sell ideas and unique products to the target audience. Honeycomb provides services such as Web Design & Development, Graphic Design, Corporate and Product Video Production, Digital Marketing, Branding, Fine-Art Printing and On-site Creative Studio at Client Location. column2: Multiplier looking for VISUAL MERCHANDISER to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey"       Develop and execute visually compelling in-store displays that effectively showcase our products and brand identity      Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including retail managers, designers, and marketing personnel, to align visual merchandising strategies with overall business objectives      Create engaging window displays that attract customers and communicate key promotions or seasonal themes      Maintain the visual presentation standards of the store by regularly refreshing displays and ensuring merchandise is well-organized and accurately labeled      Monitor sales trends and customer feedback to evaluate the effectiveness of visual merchandising strategies and make necessary adjustments      Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies to continuously innovate and improve visual merchandising techniques      Train and mentor store staff on visual merchandising best practices and provide guidance on maintaining display standards      Manage inventory levels of display materials and props, ensuring adequate supplies are available for upcoming promotions or events      Adhere to company policies and procedures regarding safety, security, and merchandising guidelines      Contribute to the development of seasonal campaigns and promotional events by providing creative input and executing visual elements as needed         >

column2: Defining, designing and implementing a creative visual merchandising strategy Creating appealing and eye-catching visual?displays that lead the customer through the entire store Producing window displays, signs, interior displays, floor plans and special promotions displays   Job brief We are looking for a creative retail Visual Merchandiser to increase sales, get buyers attention and to provide an excellent in-store experience. The goal is to use visual merchandising to convert window shoppers into prospects, drive branding and sales objectives and maximize profitability.   Responsibilities Define, design and implement a creative visual merchandising strategy Create appealing and eye-catching visual?displays that lead the customer through the entire store Produce window displays, signs, interior displays, floor plans and special promotions displays Identify key messages and set a clear image of the end result Come up with, revise and present design ideas with?assistant merchandisers Act in alignment to the organizations culture, products, image and target market Monitor costs and work within budget Oversee the production and brief staff on arranging displays Change displays to promote new product launches and reflect festive or seasonal themes Liaise with suppliers and source elements Research lifestyle, demographics and design trends Requirements and skills Proven work experience as a Visual Merchandiser or Visual Manager Demonstrable visual design skills with a strong retail merchandising portfolio Solid experience in field visual merchandising, including window displays, signs, interior displays and space utilisation Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, or other visual design tools Knowledge of current visual merchandising trends and best practices Proficiency in MS Office Creative and innovative thinker Ability to analyze sales merchandising reports and survey results BS degree in visual merchandising, fashion merchandising, exhibition design, visual communications or similar

Attend customers having challenges in hair styling Blow-drying and styling sections of the customers hair.      Demonstrating the product on consumers/video/dolly heads, showcasing the benefits unique to every customer.      Providing guidance on hair care techniques and supporting items. Ensuring a high standard of visual in the area.      Guiding customers and ensuring decrease in product returns              Desired Employment Requirement            NVQ2 or equivalent in hairdressing              Be confident in giving in-depth bespoke consultations for every customer s styling questions.              The ability to blow dry a customer s hair and section neatly.              Great consumer-facing and sales skills, including the ability to adapt your style to the needs of every consumer.              High standards of personal presentation.              An understanding of premium retail environments, and an instinct for attractive visual merchandising.              A confident approach and a friendly manner.              Previous experience in a promotional marketing and sales background              Be passionate about the hair industry and be up to date with current trends and products.              Be prepared to hit a set target
